description: Uniquely delicious dark chocolate mango and macadamia nut butter cups, made from scratch. Vegan and gluten-free recipe.
name: Dark Chocolate Mango Macadamia Nut Butter Cups
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup unsweetened flaked coconut (or 3/8 cup unsweetened shredded coconut)
2 tbsp brown rice syrup (or substitute 1 tbsp agave nectar or maple syrup)
3/4 cup frozen mango chunks (thawed and pureed or mashed)
2 tsp freshly squeezed lime or lemon juice

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare mini cupcake liners or a mini cupcake tin lined with strips of parchment paper, and have a small pastry brush or small spatula ready.
